entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
